name: Frey, the Noble God of Sunshine
text:
While this card is a summon spell, players cannot chase.
Continuous: When this card attacks, other resonators in your field gain [+200/+0] until end of turn.
Enter: Search for a magic stone from your magic stone deck and put it in your magic stone area rested. Then you shuffle your magic stone deck. Players cannot chase to this Enter:.
set: The Shaft of Light of Valhalla
